dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
Sorted Containers is an Apache2 licensed sorted collections library,
written in pure-Python, and fast as C-extensions.
dependencies.name: py-sortedcontainers

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
medaka is a tool to create consensus sequences and variant calls from
nanopore sequencing data. This task is performed using neural networks
applied a pileup of individual sequencing reads against a draft
assembly. It provides state-of-the-art results outperforming sequence-
graph based methods and signal-based methods, whilst also being faster.
dependent_to.name: py-medaka

dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.
dependent_to.name: py-mikado

dependent_to.description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.
dependent_to.name: py-vcf-kit

description: Editable interval tree data structure for Python 2 and 3.
name: py-intervaltree

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
